MindMeld: A meditation and mindfulness app that utilizes AI to tailor meditation sessions to each user's needs.
WalkRite: An app that gamifies walking and encourages users to adopt a healthier lifestyle.
FoodFit: An app that helps users find healthy and sustainable food options when dining out.
EcoCycle: An app that helps users reduce their environmental impact by tracking and reducing their waste production.
FlowCoach: An app that uses AI to provide personalized music recommendations for improving focus and productivity.
